snippet: Two Republicans in California's Congressional delegation say they will step down, as three more mull their options after redistricting.
abstract: Two Republicans in California's Congressional delegation say they will step down, as three more mull their options after redistricting.
lead_paragraph: Days after Representative Elton Gallegly announced his retirement from Congress, another veteran California Republican in the House said he, too, planned to forgo a bid for re-election.

headline.main: With House Redistricting Looming, 2 California Republicans Retire
